Question: This person featured on Ciara's second single "Love Sex Magic", the video being shot on February 20, 2009.
Hints: On March 30, 2008, this person performed the song at Madonna's Hard Candy Promo Show at Roseland Ballroom in New York City.
This person later spoofed Ashton Kutcher and Punk'd in a 2003 episode of NBC's Saturday Night Live.
This person and Jessica Biel are minority owners of the Memphis Grizzlies.
